did.unittitle: Ben Ali Theatre (movie theater), 121 East Main, exterior, street scene; man on stilts as part of a theater promotion, a sign on his back reads: "Ben Ali / Vodvil / Presentations / 18 People 18 / On Our Stage / Starts Thursday", marquee promotes "The Bitter Tea of General Yen" (1932); Thorpe's Men's Wear (123-127 East Main) is mostly visible
